title: Black screen??
body: At the end of the game I want to check my damage and stats. But it goes black screen??? Why is this??

replies.body:
If your client has a hard time reaching the servers, it could prevent you from reaching the post-game lobby and stats. If you're still seeing this happening, I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which will ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if this issue persists.
